channel.title: Looking for beta testers, many perks!
channel.description:
Hi all, I am strictly looking for beta testers for now this is a 100% free to play server At the moment i just ask for advice in return, and when server opens who knows maybe you will get a perm staff spot :D this is a PI base with customs and more to come and for a special while in beta its x2 XP and max skill level is 126 :)! thank you all and i look forward to advancing this server with you guys!! First 3 people get staff positions and donator forever! The client download link is: The FIXED client download link is: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4lg9y372dgxpx95/NuclearNationBetaCLientV1.rar?dl=0 (this client has auto download but incase it does not work use the mirror and follow the intructions) :) thanks again
MIRROR: https://www.mediafire.com/?rknvmr8q4i52p27 EXTRACT CACHE to your /C: Drive for client to work- Nuclear :)
EDIT: if interested to help me grow this server add my on skype if im not ingame> zerodown2 ALSO i fixed
